mapper.select: SELECT ol.orderListId, ol.orderDate, ol.orderDetail_orderDetailId, ol.orderStatus, ol.product_productId, ol.member_userId, od.payment, od.receiverName, od.receiverPhone, od.count, p.productName, p.member_userId, od.address1, od.address2, m.userId FROM orderList ol LEFT JOIN orderDetail od ON ol.orderDetail_orderDetailId = od.orderDetailId LEFT JOIN member m ON ol.member_userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN product p ON ol.product_productId = p.productId WHERE ol.orderStatus = #{orderStatus}
